output.burnup: python3 -c "import serpentTools,glob,json; f=glob.glob('*_res.m')[0]; res=serpentTools.read(f); print(json.dumps(res.resdata.get('burnup',[]).tolist() if hasattr(res.resdata.get('burnup',[]),'tolist') else []))" 2>/dev/null || echo '[]'
output.burnDays: python3 -c "import serpentTools,glob,json; f=glob.glob('*_res.m')[0]; res=serpentTools.read(f); print(json.dumps(res.resdata.get('burnDays',[]).tolist() if hasattr(res.resdata.get('burnDays',[]),'tolist') else []))" 2>/dev/null || echo '[]'
